name: Booty (itch)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Kevin A. Moughtin - Firebird Software, Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Jim the Cabin Boy must make his way below decks to collect various items of booty (automatically picked up when he walks past them) strewn around the ship. When you have collected 35 items from the Black Galleon's 14 holds, the game ended! Jim will meet an untimely death if he falls through a trap door or is bitten by a ship's rat.

Move: Cursor Keys
Pick keys: A or B
Play music: (on level screen): Start
Stop music: (on level screen): Select

Move: Arrow Keys
Pick keys: Z or X
Play music: (on level screen): Enter
Stop music: (on level screen): Shift

Booty - Firebird Software
